EForm.Description: Hybrid list - individual records may be required for any module - General

Column.Name: Relative Date Result
Recipients Result
Reminder Date
System Users
EForm Columns
Column.Formula: COALESCE( IFERROR( DB_GETCOLUMNS(COALESCE([Context Form], [Parent EFormType])), ARRAY() ), ARRAY() )

Column.Name: Email Content
Column.Formula: [Email Content]

Column.Name: Email Subject
Column.Formula:
IF( AND( [Parent EFormType] <> NULL(), [Parent RecordID] <> NULL(), [Email Subject] = NULL() ), "Reminder to check " & [Parent EFormType] & " #" & [Parent RecordID],
[Email Subject] )

Column.Name: End Date
Next Reminder Date
Date Email Sent String
Column.Formula: LET $dateString := ARRAY_JOIN([Date Email Sent], ", "); RETURN IF( $dateString = NULL(), "No emails sent", $dateString )

Column.Name: Reminder Purpose
Column.Formula:
IF( AND( [Parent EFormType] <> NULL(), [Parent RecordID] <> NULL(), [Reminder Purpose] = NULL() ), "Reminder to check " & [Parent EFormType] & " #" & [Parent RecordID],
[Reminder Purpose] )

Column.Name: Digest Content
Column.Formula:
LET $result := IF( [Digest Email] == TRUE, [Output HTML] );
RETURN IFERROR($result, NULL())

Column.Name: Standalone Reminder
Column.Formula: ISBLANK([Parent EFormType])

Column.Name: System Wide Matches
Content Type
Column.Formula: IF( [System Wide Reminder] = TRUE, "Email Template", "Custom" )

Column.Name: End Date Type
Column.Formula: COALESCE([End Date Type], "Period")

Column.Name: Columns Widths
Distinct Digest Recipients
Digest Recipient
Column.Formula: LET $email := EBMS_GET_ROLE_EMAIL_ADDRESSES([Context User]); RETURN IF( AND($email <> NULL, $email <> ""), $email, [Context User] )

Column.Name: Column Alias
ReplyTo Result
Cc Recipients Result
Bcc Recipients Result
Loop Limit
Attach Record PDF - Alternate View Name
Generated Summary
Parent Structure
Parent Chain
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Parent Chain")

Binding.Expression:
LET $set := ARRAY( "Details", "Timing", "Notification", IF([Digest Email] = TRUE, "Report"), IF([Parent RecordID] = NULL, "Test") );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL)

Information.Text: Reminders included 'out of the box' cannot have their name changed.

Binding.Expression: IF( [Parent RecordID] <> NULL, [Parent EFormType] & " #" & [Parent RecordID], [Context Form] )
AND( OR( [Context Form] <> NULL, [Parent EFormType] <> NULL ), [Navigation] = "Details" )

Label.Text: What kind of notification is this

Text.String: Digest style email - content includes a tabular report of information from the system
Standard reminder - content will include predefined text with no built in report

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Digest Email] = TRUE, "Static Date", [Reminder Type] )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Context Form] <> NULL, //custom reminders don't have context form [Navigation] = "Details" )

Label.Text: Filter to determine when reminders should be sent e.g., [Status] = 'Overdue'

Binding.Expression: AND( OR( [Context Form] <> NULL, [Parent EFormType] <> NULL ), [Parent RecordID] = NULL, [Navigation] = "Timing" )

Label.Text: Should the reminder have a frequency - where multiple reminders are sent over a period, or should it send a single reminder

Text.String: Multiple reminders, sent over a period of time

Label.Text: Enter the date the reminder will send
When do you want the reminder to send

Text.String: On a date listed on the parent record

Label.Text: Select the date from the parent that informs when the reminder should send

Information.Text: You can enter a static date, or pull in a date from the parent record such as an end date or expiry date.

Binding.Expression: AND( [System Wide Reminder] <> TRUE, [Standalone Reminder] <> TRUE, [Digest Email] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: When do you want the reminder to send

Text.String: On a date listed on the parent record

Label.Text: Write a rule that determine when the email should send
What exact date will reminders start sending

Binding.Expression: IF( [Reminder Frequency] = "Recurring", "Date reminders start sending", "Date reminder will send" )
AND( [Reminder Type] = "Context Date", [Navigation] = "Timing", [System Wide Reminder] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: What exact date will reminders start sending
When do you want the reminders to start sending

Text.String: On a date listed on the parent record

Title.Text: How often should the reminders send

Label.Text: When do you want the reminders to stop sending
When exactly do you want reminders to stop
When do you want the reminders to stop sending
What exact date do you want to reminders to stop sending
When do you want the reminders to stop sending

Binding.Expression: OR( [System Wide Reminder] == TRUE, AND( [Standalone Reminder] <> TRUE, [Digest Email] <> TRUE ) )
OR( [System Wide Reminder] == TRUE, AND( [Standalone Reminder] <> TRUE, [Digest Email] <> TRUE ) )

Information.Text: Select the column from the parent record that stores the role you want to recieve the email

Information.Text: This gets the email address of the roles selected in 'Named Roles from Parent' and 'Specific Users'. If an email address appears missing it may be the case that the user doesn't have an email address listed against their account.

Label.Text: Report content (automatically updates when email is triggered)

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report] <> NULL(), HASH_KEYS([DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report]), [Output Columns]#[Preview Report] )
ARRAY_SELECT(SPLIT([Columns Widths]#[Preview Report], ","), $(i, item) TRIM($item))

IF( [DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report] <> NULL(), ARRAY_SELECT( HASH_KEYS([DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report]), $(i, item) COALESCE(HASH_GET([DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report], $item), $item) ), [Output Columns]#[Preview Report] )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Content Type] = "Email Template", [System Wide Reminder] == TRUE, [Digest Email] <> TRUE, [Navigation] = "Notification" )

Information.Text: This gets the email address of the roles selected in 'Named Roles from Parent' and 'Specific Users'. If an email address appears missing it may be the case that the user doesn't have an email address listed against their account.

Label.Text: Use a targeted digest to send one email per person that only shows items assigned to them e.g., Actions assigned to me
Grouped field is entered in a multi-line input / repeater block

Information.Text: If a single record can have multiple people assigned in a single role at once then this may be required. The case where this is needed is less common so if unsure leave as blank.

Label.Text: Grouped field is an array of usernames

This shows all records that would trigger a reminder today based on the filter provided. Notifications are sent at the very start of the day, if records were created throughout the day then while they may match the filter rules, they would have missed the timing for the email.

FieldEntry.Formula: NULL()

Notification.Description: Send Reminder Email if reminder date = TODAY [Grouped on User] IS EMPTY

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Date Email Sent] = NULL(), ARRAY(NOW()), ARRAY_CONCAT( [Date Email Sent], ARRAY(NOW()) ) )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Log Date Email Sent Applicable to 'standard' reminders - i.e. sends reminder for a single record

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Trigger System Wide Email Applicable to 'system wide' reminders - i.e. sends reminder for all applicable records of an EForm Type - [System Wide Reminder] = TRUE AND [Group on User] IS EMPTY
Targeted Build Emails [Digest Email] = TRUE [Group on User] = TRUE

Label.Text: If there are any matches, then this will trigger emails for those.

Information.Text: You can click 'Send reminders now' to trigger notifications for this reminder, if the reminder date is today's date.

Binding.Expression: AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([User to Group Mapping], "Administrators") > 0, [Reminder Frequency] <> "Recurring", [Parent EFormType] == NULL(), [Navigation] = "Test" )

Notification.Description: Send Reminder Email if reminder date = TODAY Applicable to 'standard' reminders - i.e. sends reminder for a single record

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Trigger System Wide Email Applicable to 'system wide' reminders - i.e. sends reminder for all applicable records of an EForm Type - [System Wide Reminder] = TRUE AND [Group on User] IS EMPTY

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Date Email Sent] = NULL(), ARRAY(NOW()), ARRAY_CONCAT( [Date Email Sent], ARRAY(NOW()) ) )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Log Date Email Sent Applicable to 'standard' reminders - i.e. sends reminder for a single record

Information.Text: You can click 'Send reminders now' to trigger notifications for this reminder, if the next reminder date is today's date.

Binding.Expression: AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([User to Group Mapping], "Administrators") > 0, [Reminder Frequency] = "Recurring", [Parent EFormType] == NULL(), [Navigation] = "Test" )

FieldEntry.Formula: TRUE
DB_GETCOLUMNS(COALESCE([Context Form], [Parent EFormType]))

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.FieldValuesFormula:
LET $aliasData := HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Column Alias"); LET $aliases := ARRAY_SELECT(HASH_KEYS($aliasData), $(i, item) HASH_GET($aliasData, $item));
RETURN HASH( "Report Display - Order By", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Order By"),
"Report Display - Order By Type", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Order By Type"),
"Show View Link", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Show View Link"),
"Report Display - Column Name", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "Output Column Names"),
"Report Display - Column Alias", $aliases,
"Report Display - Column Width", SPLIT(HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "Columns Widths"), ","),
"Report Display - Column Format", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Format") )

Binding.Expression: COALESCE(SUM(EACH [Report Display - Column Width]), 0) & " / " & IF([Show View Link] = TRUE, "95", "100")

FieldEntry.Formula: NULL()

Binding.Expression: COALESCE( [Report Display - Form Columns], //#[Preview Report], ARRAY() )

Text.String: Date and time (dd MMMM yyyy hh:mm tt)

FieldEntry.Formula: NULL()
IF( [DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report] <> NULL(), HASH_KEYS([DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report]), [Output Columns]#[Preview Report] )
ARRAY_SELECT(SPLIT([Columns Widths]#[Preview Report], ","), $(i, item) TRIM($item))

IF( [DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report] <> NULL(), ARRAY_SELECT( HASH_KEYS([DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report]), $(i, item) COALESCE(HASH_GET([DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report], $item), $item) ), [Output Columns]#[Preview Report] )

Title.Text: Show view link next to each result in the table (uses 5% of the table width)

Binding.Expression: COALESCE( [Report Display - Form Columns], //#[Preview Report], ARRAY() )

Information.Text: Note: Report will produce errors if sorting on an 'any' column; this form cannot detect datatype, it's on the person creating the report to be aware of the datatype of any selected columns

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Report Display - Column Name], $(i, item) $item <> NULL())

HASH( "DG - Show View Link", [Show View Link],
"DG - Order By", EACH [Report Display - Order By],
"DG - Order By Type", EACH [Report Display - Order By Type],
"Output Column Names", EACH [Report Display - Column Name],
"DG - Column Alias", INDEXES_TO_KEYS( EACH [Report Display - Column Alias], EACH [Report Display - Column Name] ),
"Columns Widths", ARRAY_JOIN(EACH [Report Display - Column Width], ","),
"DG - Format", EACH [Report Display - Column Format] )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Filter String] = NULL, [Report Loaded] = TRUE, [Context Form] = "sys.Audit", [Navigation] = "Report" )

IFERROR( "
" & [Output HTML] & "
", NULL() )
AND( [Parent RecordID] = NULL, ARRAY_INDEXOF([User to Group Mapping], "Administrators") > 0 )

FieldEntry.Formula: TRUE
DB_GETCOLUMNS(COALESCE([Context Form], [Parent EFormType]))

RETURN HASH( "Report Display - Order By", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Order By"),
"Report Display - Order By Type", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Order By Type"),
"Show View Link", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Show View Link"),
"Report Display - Column Name", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "Output Column Names"),
"Report Display - Column Alias", $aliases,
"Report Display - Column Width", SPLIT(HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "Columns Widths"), ","),
"Report Display - Column Format", HASH_GET([DG Report Lookup], "DG - Format") )

Binding.Expression: COALESCE(SUM(EACH [Report Display - Column Width]), 0) & " / " & IF([Show View Link] = TRUE, "95", "100")

ARRAY_SELECT(SPLIT([Columns Widths]#[Preview Report], ","), $(i, item) TRIM($item))

IF( [DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report] <> NULL(), ARRAY_SELECT( HASH_KEYS([DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report]), $(i, item) COALESCE(HASH_GET([DG - Column Alias]#[Preview Report], $item), $item) ), [Output Columns]#[Preview Report] )

"DG - Order By Type", EACH [Report Display - Order By Type],
"Output Column Names", EACH [Report Display - Column Name],

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE -- Check if the reminder is a system reminder - these can only be accessed by admins WHEN [System Wide Reminder] <> TRUE AND [Digest Email] <> TRUE THEN ( CASE -- Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
--Check if parent is Contract and if user has access via Contract record WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN (STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Parent RecordID] AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor]) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE END )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
END

CASE -- Check if the reminder is a system reminder - these can only be accessed by admins WHEN [System Wide Reminder] <> TRUE AND [Digest Email] <> TRUE THEN ( CASE -- Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
--Check if parent is Contract and if user has access via Contract record WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN (STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Parent RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor]) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE END )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
END

CASE -- Check if the reminder is a system reminder - these can only be accessed by admins WHEN [System Wide Reminder] <> TRUE AND [Digest Email] <> TRUE
THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone'
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
END

FieldEntry.Formula: $eventargs

LET $input := [Context User];
LET $column := DB_ENCODEIDENTIFIER([Group on User]); //target field
RETURN IF( [Array of Email Addresses Check] = TRUE, DB_ENCODECONSTANT($input) & " IN ARRAY " & $column,
[Array of Email Addresses Check] <> TRUE, DB_ENCODECONSTANT($input) & " = " & $column ) & " AND " & $column & " IS NOT EMPTY"
IF( [Navigation] = "Report", "Report", "Default" )
NULL()

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Trigger: 'Send Email' on all forms that need to send emails - only applicable to 'system wide reminders' - e.g. reminders of expiration or due dates. Other email types e.g. digest emails are sent via the scheduled event
